Question: This person is one of the UK's wealthiest people, with an estimated fortune of £475 million in 2010.

In 2010, this person opened the Consol Energy Center in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
In 2007, this person signed with Hear Music, becoming the label's first artist.
